title: suffering, causes of
comment: The ultimate cause of suffering is sin, which has brought violence, disease and death into the world. All suffering, however, is under the sovereign purpose of God, who is able to use it for his glory.

children.title: The ultimate cause of suffering is sin
Suffering as a result of human wickedness
Suffering as a result of misfortune
Suffering through old age and death
Suffering brought about by God himself
All suffering comes within his will
Some suffering is for his immediate glory
